name: 240-7 dazzling diamonds vest
sizes_available: s – m – l – xl – xxl – xxxl
notes:
**knitted top/vest in drops muskat or drops cotton merino. piece is knitted top down with lace pattern, straps and button band. size: s - xxxl**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern r-816
yarn group b

----------------------------------------------------------


**size**:
s - m - l - xl - xl/xxl - xxl/xxxl

**yarn**:
drops muskat from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group b)
250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour no 08, off white

or use:
drops cotton merino (belongs to yarn group b)
250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 01, off white

**buttons**:
drops button no 628: 4-4-5-5-5-5 pieces

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 4 mm: length: 80 cm
drops double pointed needles size 4 mm

**knitting tension**:
21 stitches in width and 28 rows vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
note! remember that needle size is only a suggestion. if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles. if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles.
